trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.ItemCreated"></xref> and <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.ItemDataBound"></xref> events.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.ItemCreated?displayProperty=fullName> event is raised when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem> is created by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath> control.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.ItemDataBound?displayProperty=fullName> event is raised when `DataBind` is called on the item during a call to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CreateControlHierarchy%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.ItemDataBound?displayProperty=fullName>引发事件时`DataBind`到<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CreateControlHierarchy%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CreateControlHierarchy%2A?displayProperty=fullName>调用期间对此项调用</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.ItemDataBound?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItemEventArgs"></xref> class, setting the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem"></xref> object as the source of the event.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItemEventArgs"></xref>类，设置指定<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem"></xref>对象作为事件源。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem"></xref> that is the source of the event.
Gets the node item that is the source of the event.
trans-unit.target: 获取源的事件的节点项。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem"></xref> that is the source of the event.
